contradictions.description: How can it be the lowest black unemployment rate ever if it was supposedly so low back in the day?

description: Donald Trump is responsible for achieving the lowest ever black unemployment rate
tips: Donald Trump inherited a strong economy when he took office
The black unemployment rate has been steadily decreasing since 2010
The same is true for the number of food stamp recipients
How is it that Donald Trump deserves credit for a trend that predates his presidency by seven years?
Has this person given any credit to Barack Obama for lowering the black unemployment rate? If not, then why?

description: Before the welfare state was introduced, black unemployment was lower than white unemployment
Donald Trump is responsible for a booming stock market
tips: The stock market isn't the economy
Figures like the unemployment rate, inflation rate, and GDP are much better indicators of how strong an economy is
The stock market has been steadily increasing since the early 2010's
How is it that Donald Trump deserves credit for a trend that predates his presidency by several years?
Has this person given any credit to Barack Obama for increasing the stock market? If not, then why?

description: Donald Trump sacrificed his billionaire lifestyle to serve the American people
tips: Donald Trump didn't abandon his billionare lifestyle once he became president.
He still retained his billionare status and also had the added luxury of being the most powerful person in the world

contradictions.description: How was he an open borders marxist if he was so harsh on illegal immigration?

description: Barack Obama was an open borders marxist who let illegal aliens flood over the border
tips: Countries with the strictest borders have historically been hardcore communist countries like East Germany, USSR, North Korea, China, and Cuba.

contradictions.description: Why did Obama deport so many people if he's an open borders marxist?

description: Barack Obama deported more illegals than any other president
tips: This is just whataboutism
Trump may have deported a lot of people but what about Obama?
If the person making this argument is in favor of tougher immigration laws then shouldn't they like Obama?
Statistically, more people were deported from the U.S. during Obama's presidency than during that of any other president
That statistic was due in large part to a change in how "deportations" are defined rather than to an increase in the number of persons deported.

contradictions.description: If COVID is no worse than the seasonal flu then what exactly does China need to be held accountable for?
If criticizing a country's government is the same as criticizing the citizens of that country as a group of human beings, then how is this argument not racist towards Chinese people?

description: China must be held accountable for the deaths caused by COVID-19
tips: This is thinly veiled racism
It isn't logical or moral to hold all or most Chinese people accountable for the actions of other Chinese people just because they belong to the same race

contradictions.description: If COVID is no worse than the seasonal flu then what exactly does China need to be held accountable for?

description: COVID-19 has a 99% survival rate
tips: If every American caught COVID and 99% of them survived, that would still translate to over 3 million deaths
If 3 million Americans died from gun violence in Chicago, would the person making this argument remain unphased?
If 3 million abortions were performed in America in one year, would the person making this argument person still care?

contradictions.description: If the federal government shouldn't be able to tamper with a state or local government's autonomy, then what difference should it make that sanctuary cities are in violation of federal law?

description: States rights need to be protected against federal intrusion
tips: The only time people even bother making this argument is when they disagree with a federal law
If the federal law is one that they already agree with, then they'll argue that federal law reigns supreme
Oppression is still oppression even if it's being committed by a local municipality instead of the federal government

contradictions.description: If the federal government shouldn't be able to tamper with a state or local government's autonomy, then what difference should it make that sanctuary cities are in violation of federal law?
If this person doesn't like the laws of a particular city, then can't they just move somewhere else?
Violating local laws in an effort to make cities safer seems to ignore this quote from Benjamin Franklin

description: Sanctuary cities are in violation of federal law
tips: Immigrants commit less crimes than native-born Americans
Would any of the crimes committed by undocumented immigrants be any less tragic if they were committed by native born white men?
If not, then why is their immigration status relevant to the discussion?
If a deep red state like Texas decided to adopt lax gun laws that violated federal firearms laws, would the person using this argument be okay with that? Why or why not?

contradictions.description: If law and order is such an important part of America's moral fabric, then why is it considered patriotic to defy lockdown orders and mask madates? Why is this person afforded the luxury of being able to break the law while others aren't?

description: Law and order must be respected
tips: Everyone is in favor of law and order when the laws serve to benefit them
If you're only going to appeal to the law when it's advantageous for you to do so then don't bother doing it all

contradictions.description: Obeying the law is important unless it's a law that I don't like. Then it's communism.

description: Lockdown orders should be disobeyed
tips: People who use this argument will try to split hairs and say that there's a huge difference between things like orders, mandates, laws, legistlation, bills and so on
In reality, it's just a petty semantics game. It's a way to help ease the cognitive dissonance that comes along with blatantly disobeying the law after years of appealing to it

contradictions.description: Why is this person defending the

description: Tearing down Confederate statues is erasing history
tips: The statues would be placed in museums; not destroyed
People would still learn about history through books and classes

contradictions.description: How can it be the party of white supremacy if it's also the party that is biased against white people?
Really strange how the people who use this argument are also the ones who are first in line to protect Confederate monuments

description: The DemoKKKrats are the REAL white supremacists.
tips: The two parties switched in the 1960's
Most people who use this argument know that it's complete bullshit
If they sincerely believed it then they wouldn't fight so hard to preserve Confederate statues

contradictions.description: How can it be the party of white supremacy if it's also the party that is biased against white people?

description: The Democratic party has an anti-white agenda

contradictions.description: Why does Trump deserve credit for something that isn't safe? Would you hold it against Trump if anyone developed dangerous side effects after taking the vaccine? Why or why not?

description: Donald Trump deserves credit for developing a vaccine in such a short amount of time
tips: Donald Trump has no medical credentials
Donald Trump was an anti-vaxxer prior to becoming president
Steven Crowder even admits this

contradictions.description: Why does Trump deserve credit for something that isn't safe? Would you hold it against Trump if anyone developed dangerous side effects after taking the vaccine? Why or why not?

description: The COVID-19 vaccine is dangerous and possibly a ploy by Bill Gates and Anthony Fauci to implant us all with microchips
tips: The COVID-19 vaccine has earned the FDA's seal of approval
The COVID-19 vaccine has been tested and peer reviewed by thousands of independent scientists and they're all coming to the same conclusion: the vaccine is safe

contradictions.description: If people will always find ways to circumvent the law then how will banning abortions stop them from happening?

description: Criminals will always find ways to get guns even if they're illegal
tips: France, Germany, Britain, Belgium, the Netherlands, Australia, New Zealand, and Japan all have much stricter gun control and their rates of violent crime are much lower

contradictions.description: If abortion bans are effective then how come gun bans aren't?
A woman's right to have an abortion is protected by the 14th amendment

description: If abortion is outlawed, few, if any, women will get them
tips: Many of the people who use this argument have more empathy for a five day old clump of cells than they do for actual living, breathing adults

_comment1: Add 1964 Civil Rights bill as contradiction

contradictions.description: Big tech companies are private entities. Why should they be forced to host content that runs contrary to their core beliefs?

description: Private businesses reserve the right to refuse service for any reason
tips: Many who use this argument will do a complete 180 as soon as they become personally affected by private entity refusing to do business with them
Should businesses still reserve the right to refuse service to people of certain races or ethnicities?

contradictions.description: Big tech companies are private entities. Why should they be forced to host content that runs contrary to their core beliefs?
You aren't entitled to anything... except for a platform

description: Private tech companies are obligated to host my content
tips: No one is under any obligation to provide a service to a total stranger
Especially if that stranger is abusing that service by posting misinformation and baseless conspiracies

People who use this argument like to play up the whole "I'm being censored for speaking the TRUTH!" angle and place themselves in the same league as genuinely heroic thinkers like Galileo and Socrates

Most people who get banned from social media aren't banned because they're dishing out such hard-hitting, nunanced criticisms of complex political theory that the big tech oligarchs are shitting their pants and have to silence them
Most people get banned because they're posting batshit crazy conspiracies about satanic pedo rings being run from the basements of obscure pizza parlors
Aristotle and Plato these people are not

description: Section 230 needs to be repealed
tips: Section 230 is what prevents tech companies from being held liable for threats and calls to violence that are hosted on their platforms
Getting rid of section 230 would give tech companies even more of an incentive to crack down on stuff like fake news and hate speech

description: California is a socialist shit hole
tips: California is the world's fifth largest economy
There are more millionaires in California than there are in any other state in America
The reason that California has such a high homeless population is because of something that isn't even related to politics
California's warm and dry weather ensures that it never snows and rarely rains
That makes it much easier to be homeless there than it would be in a place like Massachusetts or Minnesota
Ask the person who uses this argument which laws in particular make California socialist and how they differ from laws in other states

contradictions.description: How can Europe be a socialist shit hole if it's more capitalist than America?

description: Europe is a socialist shit hole
tips: Socialism isn't when the government provides health care or finances paternity leave
Socialism is when the workers own the means of production
None of the countries in Europe meet the criteria for being socialist
Conservatives even admit this when they're in full blown 'own the libs' mode

contradictions.description: How can Europe have more economic freedom than America if it's a socialist shit hole?

description: Europe has more economic freedom than America
tips: Conservatives have never been able to come up with satisfactory answer to the Scandinavian question
Sometimes they'll take this approach and actually admit that Europe has a lot going for it
But, with one condition: Europe's success is largely the result of capitalism and not socialism
The problem is that this argument contradicts what many right-wing pundits have been saying about Europe for years now about how it's a socialst shit hole

contradictions.description: Always back the blue... until you don't

description: Back the blue
tips: Bootlicking and worshipping authority doesn't make someone strong; it makes them a bitch

contradictions.description: If you're someone who backs the blue, why is Kamala being a cop a bad thing?

description: Kamala Harris is a cop
tips: Kamala Harris did work for many years as a district attorney in San Francisco
Her record as DA has been spotty
She's locked up people for smoking drugs that she has confessed to smoking herself
She purposely kept some prisoners locked up solely to use them as cheap labor

contradictions.description: A virgin giving birth to someone who would later die and then come back to life again is not consistent with biology

description: There are only two genders. It's basic biology
tips: This isn't what most biologists say about gender
This argument is really just concern trolling
Most people who will use this argument don't have any sincere appreciation for biology, or any other area of science, for that matter

contradictions.description: Someone coming back from the dead isn't consistent with biology

description: Jesus rose from the dead
tips: Dead people don't come back to life
It's a pity that some functioning adults need to have this explained to them
It doesn't happen now even with all of the advances in medicine and technology
It certainly didn't happen thousands of years ago

contradictions.description: If feminism is such a bad thing then shouldn't American conservatism and Islam be compatible in at least one respect?

description: Feminism is cancer
tips: Feminism is just the idea that women and men should be treated equally

description: Islam treats women like second class citizens
tips: This is precsely why feminists fight for women's rights
Only to be mocked and ridiculed by conservative men who pretend to support women's rights whenever the topic of Islamic immigration is broached

description: The nazis were socialists
tips: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea isn't really democratic even though the word "democratic" is in the country's name
The IRA aren't a group of Republicans just because the word "Republican" is in the name
There are literally hundreds of counter examples to this argument

contradictions.description: So they're anarchists but also worship government like it's a god? Anarchists don't support any government

description: The left are a bunch of violent anarchists

contradictions.description: So they worship government like it's a god but also don't believe in the concept of government?

description: The left wants to replace god with government
tips: Worshipping government isn't a prerequisite for wanting affordable health care or decent services in exchange for paying taxes

description: Communism is when stuff happens that I don't like
tips: Words like "fascism", "communism", "socialism", and "totalitarianism" are used as catch-all terms to describe any and all situations where the government does stuff that they don't like
Sort of like how teenagers in the 2000's would use the word "gay" to describe any person, place, or event that they didn't like. "That's so gay!"

contradictions.description: Maybe these self-proclaimed constitutionalists have never heard of the 16th amendment?
Maybe they've never heard of the 14th?
Maybe they still haven't gotten the news the Supreme Court ruled that a woman's right to have an abortion is protected by the 14th amendment

description: Defend the constitution
tips: Most people who claim to have a fond appreciation for the constitution have never even read it
Their knowledge of anything related to the constitition is limited to whatever platitudes are currently being regurgitated by their favorite talking heads

contradictions.description: The 16th amendment grants the federal government the authority to collect income tax
If taxation is theft then why are conservatives so opposed to the idea of defunding the police? How do they think police departments are funded?

description: Taxation is theft
tips: Then let's stop funding police departments that kill unarmed people and get away with it

contradictions.description: Birthright citizenship is protected by the 14th amendment

description: End birthright citizenship
tips: Thinly veiled racism
Most wouldn't even think twice about granting citizenship to children born here if the children were white

contradictions.description: If rights come from god and not government, then how does someone's passport determine what rights they have?

description: Rights come from god
tips: If rights aren't granted by governments, then how does this person even know that rights exist?
Rights aren't tangible. They can't be seen or touched or anything
How does the person making this argument know that they have a right to keep what they've earned?
What proof do they have that rights exist independent of governments?

contradictions.description: If rights come from god and not government, then how does someone's passport determine what rights they have?

description: Undocumented immigrants don't have any rights because they aren't citizens
tips: Every human has rights

description: China kept COVID-19 a secret and more people died as a result
Donald Trump purposely downplayed the risks of COVID-19 to prevent panic and it was the right thing to do
Having the government run something will turn it into the DMV
tips: This is an obvious straw man
People who want the government to run health care want hospitals to be staffed with the best doctors, surgeons, nurses, and so on
No one who wants universal health care wants desk jockies and DMV flunkies to be in charge of running health care

contradictions.description: Stay here? Move somewhere else? Pick on

description: If you don't love America then leave
tips: Does the person making this argument like all of the laws in America? The ones about guns? The ones about taxes? The ones about welfare?
If not, then why does this person still live in America? Why haven't they left?

contradictions.description: Stay here? Move somewhere else? Pick one

description: Fix your own country instead of moving to another one
tips: If the pilgrims had this attitude, would America even exist today?

description: You have low IQ
tips: People with high IQs generally don't brag about their IQs
If you're truly intelligent, you shouldn't have to go aroung telling others that you're intelligent. Intelligence is something that's more demonstrated than said.
People who brag about their supposed high IQs or who put others down for supposedly having low IQs are almost certainly projecting
Anyone who uses this argument almost definitely has a case of Dunning-Kruger

description: Higher minimum wage laws are socialist and kill jobs
tips: Automation isn't necessarily a bad thing
Arguing that higher minimum wage kills jobs is like arguing that ATMs put bank tellers out of work
Technology will continue to advance regardless of how high the minimum wage is

contradictions.description: If minimum wage is socialist and kills jobs then isn't Colin Kaepernick doing something good by giving jobs to workers in sweatshops?

description: Someone I don't like had their products made in a sweat shop
tips: This is grade A concern trolling
Many who use this argument are opposed to the concept of a minimum wage
But, if someone like Colin Kaepernick has his clothing made in sweatshops, then those same people who oppose minimum wage suddenly become concerned about exploitation and workers' rights...
They're not objecting to sweatshops. They're objecting to who is using them.
When it was revealed that some of Trump's clothing was made in China, there was absolutely no concern for the people who worked in sweatshops

description: You keep the doors on your home locked but support open borders
tips: Homes and countries aren't the same things
This should be obvious to almost everyone
A person can own a home and the owner can decide who gets to come in and out of his/her property
A person cannot own a country

contradictions.description: They're concerned that the cruelty of America's immigration system can't be extended to those who come illegally, more than anything.

description: Amnesty is a slap in the face to all of those who waited to become citizens legally
tips: This is an appeal to suffering
It's like saying that the underground railroad was a bad thing because of all the slaves who waited to be legally emancipated

description: Socialism ensures that everyone is equally miserable

contradictions.description: Boycotting a company is essentially trying to cancel it. Why are some people able to cancel but not others?

description: Cancel culture
tips: The people who complain the most about cancel culture are usually the most eager to cancel others
Sort of like how Haggard's law tells us that the people who are the most vocally opposed to homosexuality are the ones who are most likely to get busted in a cheap motel room with a male escort

description: Exploiting tragedies
Vets before illegals
tips: People who use this argument only care about homeless vets when it's politically convenient
Most proponents of this argument oppose spending more money to help the homeless and tend to think of people who collect welfare as moochers and junkies

contradictions.description: Why are homeless vets more deserving of compassion than undocumented immigrants if no one is entitled to anything?

description: You aren't entitled to anything
tips: This is a completely vacuous thing to say
There isn't a single thing that human beings are entitled to? Not one?
Likely projection on behalf of the person saying it
They're entitled but feel guilty about it so they unload that anger on to easy targets as a way of assuaging their guilt

description: Free speech
The Democratic party is embracing communism
The Democratic party is the corporate party
Identity politics is cancer
Look at all of these non-white Republicans
Weed should be legal. How could I be a Republican?
tips: Supporting weed legalization would have earned you some progressive clout if it were still 1967 you were kicking it in Haight-Ashbury
But, it's 2020 and even Mississippi, of all states, has decriminalized marijuana
If you want some bonafide left wing cred nowadays, you need to do a lot more than just support legalizing weed
A lot of people who use this argument think that supporting weed legalization is a license to spew conservative talking points ad nauseam without ever being called out

contradictions.description: Boycotting something is essentially trying to cancel it

description: Boycott this company
tips: As of 2021, conservatives have boycotted Netlix, Gillette, the NFL, the NBA, TikTok, Goodyear, Starbucks, Budweiser, Keurig, Nike, CNN, HBO

description: Those who sacrifice liberty for security deserve neither
Build a wall to keep us safe from violent illegal aliens

contradictions.description: If victimhood is so toxic then why are some conservatives competing alongside gay people in the oppression olympics?

description: So many people are dying to be a victim
tips: Many people are legitimate victims of oppression
Being expected to wear a mask in order to prevent the spread of infectious diseases is not oppression
Censoring misinformation that has the potential to have real world consequences is not oppression

contradictions.description: Why even bother making this argument if you're oppossed to things like victim culture?

description: Conservatives are more persecuted today than gay people were in the 1980's
tips: Conservatives never had to fight for the right to marry or not get fired because of their sexuality

description: Liberals always want to win the oppression olympics

contradictions.description: Why should it matter which group has suffered more? It's not like this is supposed to be a competition.

description: Illegals haven't suffered as much as holocaust victims have therefore they have no right to complain

contradictions.description: If criticizing a country's government is the same as criticizing the citizens of that country as a group of human beings, then is criticizing the CCP racist towards Chinese people?

description: Anti-zionism is synonymous with anti-semitism
tips: Hating a government isn't the same thing as hating the people who live under that government

description: I don't hate Chinese people, I hate the Chinese government
America is not a democracy. It's a republic.
tips: This is like saying LeBron James is NOT an athlete. He's a basketball player. Learn the difference
There actually isn't much of a difference. A constitutional republic is a kind of democracy
